{{Lang|'''Lan Yan'''{{Name Order|Chinese}}|zh=蓝砚|zh_rm=Lán Yàn}} is a playable {{Anemo}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is a humble yet skilled rattan weaver, adept in the Qimen Arts, and a member of the [[Chenyu Vale]] Artisans Association. Her thoughtful perspective shines bright like silver to everyone she meets.
